author: Special Correspondent
text:
The City Police has announced traffic diversion in the city limits from Wednesday in connection with the commencement of two-tier flyover works at the Five Roads Junction.

A press release of the City Police issued here on Tuesday said that all the vehicles proceeding towards the Five Roads roundabout from the Sona College road and the Tiruvakavundanur by-pass road should pass via AVR Junction, Koranguchavadi signal and Omalur main road.

The vehicles proceeding to AVR Junction from the Five Roads roundabout will take the usual route, the release said. The press release called upon the vehicle users to cooperate with the city traffic police in implementing the traffic diversion.
title: Traffic diversion
